description: [Play](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1040) developed and employ [Playcrypt](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1162) ransomware.(Citation: Trend Micro Ransomware Spotlight Play July 2023)(Citation: CISA Play Ransomware Advisory December 2023)
